text: Ezɨ kɨ amizir ingangariba bar, kɨ kamaghɨn ian aka, e kamaghɨn amizir ingangarir osɨmtɨzibar, e ingaran iburazir gumaziba, e men akurvagham. Ezɨ ia Ekiam Iesus, a uabɨ mɨkemezir akam gɨnɨghnɨgh, ‘Arazir aghuarim, nɨ bizim munav ganɨngi. Egha a uaghan nɨ ua baghɨvɨra biziba isir arazim gafira.’”
